title: Domonique Foxworth | The Ringer NFL Show
description:
The Ringer’s Kevin Clark is joined by ESPN’s Domonique Foxworth to discuss other sports’ protests against racism and what kind of protests NFL players might do (2:34). Then they speak about what this season could look like for Lamar Jackson (25:05), how different it is playing cornerback in today’s game (33:58), and more.
Host: Kevin Clark 
Guest: Domonique Foxworth
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
